title: Hands-on with Google’s new Nexus 5X, Nexus 6P and Pixel C [Gallery]
text: Google Takes On iPhone With New Nexus Phones 03:02 Sept. 29 -- Google unveiled its newest Nexus smartphones from Huawei and LG Electronics with improved cameras, stronger batteries and an updated operating system as it tries to slow the growth of Apple’s iPhone. Bloomberg's Cory Johnson reports on "Bloomberg Markets." Recent related news Google unveils new Nexus phones, Chromecasts, Pixel C tablet & more At a Tuesday press event, Apple rival Google announced a wide slate of new hardware including two new Nexus phones, new Chromecasts, and the Pixel C Android...
